instagram.title: To get the instagram post id :
steps: Open a post in a browser window
and copy the URL from the address bar.
The URL should be in the format: https://www.instagram.com/p/abc123xyzAB/
Copy its id . it will be like the highlighted text above

facebook.title: To get the Facebook page name associated to the link:
steps: Get the page link it will be in this format : www.facebook.com/Villade11?...
Copy its name . it will be like the highlighted text above

youtube.title: To get the Youtube video link:
steps: Open a video in a browser window and copy the URL from the address bar.
The URL should be in the format: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K4xCjdwNKlA/
Copy its id . it will be like the highlighted text above

array.question: Where can I buy Viladi products?
array.answer:
Viladi snacks are available at most supermarkets and retail stores across Syria, as well as in several Arab countries including Iraq, Lebanon, Jordan, Saudi Arabia, and Sudan.
We are actively expanding our distribution and offer dedicated support for wholesalers and regional distributors.

array.question: Are Viladi products healthy and safe?
array.answer:
Yes. At Viladi, we prioritize safety and quality by using premium ingredients and applying strict food safety standards at every stage of production.
We use carefully selected vegetable oils and ensure fat and salt levels remain within healthy limits.

array.question: Are your products Halal?
array.answer: Absolutely. All Viladi products are made with 100% Halal-certified ingredients and undergo rigorous health and quality inspections.

array.question: What’s the difference between your snack brands?
array.answer:
Each of our sub-brands offers a unique taste experience:

Viladi Puff : -Light, fun snacks for kids and adults with playful flavors.

Viladi Corn : -Bold, crunchy roasted corn with savory seasonings.

Timali Corn – Edgy, modern corn snacks with intense flavor profiles.

TikaPop : – Lightly flavored popcorn, perfect for movie nights and gatherings.

array.question: Do you offer direct delivery to consumers?
array.answer:
Currently, we do not provide direct sales from our factory to individual consumers.
However, we’re happy to guide you to the nearest authorized retailer or distributor. Just get in touch!

array.question: How can I become a distributor or business partner?
array.answer:
We welcome collaboration with local and international distributors and wholesalers.
Please reach out via our Contact Us page or email:
📧 AMMAR_MANSOUR@villadifoodindustries.com

array.question: What flavors are available in your products?
array.answer:
Our flavor range includes both sweet and savory favorites, such as:
Ketchup, Cheddar Cheese, Pizza, Noodles, Barbecue
Strawberry, Mixed Fruits, Vanilla, Chocolate
Japanese Pepper, Sweet Corn, Parmesan, and more.

array.question: Are your snacks suitable for children?
array.answer:
Yes! Many of our products — especially Viladi Puff and TikaPop — are kid-friendly, suitable for children above 3 years old.
All flavors are designed to be enjoyable and safe. Parental supervision is always recommended for younger kids.

array.question: Can I follow your updates on social media?
array.answer:
Definitely! We're highly active on social media — sharing our latest products, behind-the-scenes content, and special offers.
📱 Instagram: @villadico
📘 Facebook: Villadi Co.

array.question: Can Viladi products be exported to other countries?
array.answer:
Yes. Our products are export-ready and meet the food safety and packaging standards required in Arab markets.
We currently export to Iraq, Lebanon, Jordan, Saudi Arabia, and Sudan, and we are actively expanding into new regions.

array.question: Do you hold quality certifications or export documents?
array.answer:
Yes. We comply with strict food manufacturing regulations and provide full documentation for export, including:

Certificate of Origin

Laboratory Analysis Reports (from certified labs)

Commercial Invoices & Technical Specifications

Compliance Certificates (upon request)

array.question: Can I customize packaging or flavors for my market?
array.answer:
Yes. We offer customization options for flavors, packaging, and labeling to suit the preferences of different markets or clients.
This includes private packaging designs and multi-language labels.
Note: Minimum order quantities apply for custom production.

array.question: What partnership models do you offer?
array.answer:
We’re open to various forms of B2B collaboration, such as:

Exclusive regional distribution

Sales agency representation

Wholesale importing

Private Label production

Feel free to contact us to discuss opportunities:
📧 Sales@villadifoodindustries.com

array.question: What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ) for exports?
array.answer:
The MOQ depends on the destination and product type.
Generally, orders start from one 20-ft container or equivalent volume.
We provide customized quotations based on quantity and shipping destination.

array.question: Can you assist with shipping or delivery to port?
array.answer:
Yes. We work with experienced local and international freight companies and can coordinate delivery under various incoterms:

Ex-Works (EXW) – Factory pickup

FOB – Latakia or Tartous port

CIF – Available upon request

array.question: How do I request a price quote?
array.answer:
Please send an email or use the contact form on our website with the following details:

Company Name

Country of Operation

Product Range of Interest

Estimated Quantities

📧 Purchases@villadifoodindustries.com
📞 (Business WhatsApp will be provided soon)

sections.content:
Please read these terms carefully before using this website or contacting us regarding our products and services.
By accessing or using this website, you agree to be bound by the following terms:

sections.title: Intellectual Property
sections.content:
All content on this website is the intellectual property of Viladi Food Industries, including but not limited to:

Text content

Images

Logos and trademarks

Packaging designs and product visuals

You may not reproduce, reuse, or distribute any of these materials without prior written consent from the company.

sections.title: Product Information
sections.content:
We make every effort to ensure the accuracy of information regarding our products, flavors, and nutritional content.
However, Viladi reserves the right to modify or update product descriptions or specifications without prior notice.

sections.title: Pricing and Availability
sections.content:
All prices, specifications, and availability — for both local sales and exports — are subject to change at any time without notice.
Product availability may vary depending on region or market conditions.

sections.title: Copyright and Distribution Rights
sections.content:
No Viladi product may be repackaged, distributed, or resold under a different name or brand without formal written agreement.
Commercial use is restricted to authorized partnerships only.

sections.title: Responsible Website Use
sections.content:
You agree not to use this website for any unlawful purposes or to submit misleading, offensive, or fraudulent information.
Viladi reserves the right to take legal action when necessary to protect its rights.

sections.title: Privacy Policy
sections.content:
We value your privacy. Any personal information collected through this website (e.g., email addresses, contact forms) will be used exclusively for direct communication or to inform you of relevant product offers.
We do not share your personal data with any third parties.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content:
For questions related to these terms or business inquiries, please contact us at:
📧 Resources@villadifoodindustries.com
📧 AMMARMANSOUR@villadifoodindustries.com (for partners and export inquiries)
📞 [Phone number to be added]

sections.title: Updates to These Terms
sections.content:
Viladi Food Industries reserves the right to amend or update these terms at any time.
We recommend reviewing this page periodically to stay informed.

At Viladi Food Industries, we are committed to protecting your privacy and handling your personal data responsibly and transparently.
By using our website or communicating with us through any digital channel, you agree to the terms outlined in this Privacy Policy:

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content:
When you interact with us or use our website, we may collect the following data:

Full Name

Email Address

Phone Number

Country / City

Message content or inquiries

Browsing data (e.g., IP address, browser type)

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.content:
We use collected data for the following purposes:

To respond to inquiries and support requests

To send offers, product updates, and promotions (with your consent)

To enhance your browsing experience

To improve our services based on user interests

To communicate with distributors and business clients

sections.title: Data Protection
sections.content:
We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data from:

Unauthorized access

Unlawful modification or deletion

Data breaches or misuse

sections.title: Information Sharing
sections.content:
We do not sell or rent your personal data to third parties.
Some information may be shared with trusted service providers (e.g., hosting companies, analytics tools) under strict confidentiality agreements.

sections.title: Cookies Policy
sections.content:
We use cookies to enhance site functionality and monitor user behavior in a non-personalized manner.
You can adjust your browser settings at any time to disable cookies.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content:
You have the right to:

Request a copy of your personal data

Request correction or deletion of your information

Unsubscribe from marketing communications
To submit a request, contact us at: 📧 Resources@villadifoodindustries.com

sections.title: External Links
sections.content:
Our website may contain links to third-party websites.
Viladi is not responsible for the privacy practices of external sites. Please review their privacy policies independently.

sections.title: Changes to This Policy
sections.content:
We reserve the right to update or modify this privacy policy at any time.
Any updates will be published on this page. Continued use of the website implies your acceptance of the updated policy.

sections.title: 📬 Contact Us
sections.content:
If you have any questions about how we collect, use, or protect your data, please contact us:

📧 Resources@villadifoodindustries.com
📧 AMMARMANSOUR@villadifoodindustries.com

Bulk snacks with quality that fits your business.br/>At Viladi Food Industries, we don't just serve end consumers — we offer tailored foodservice solutions for the hospitality, retail, and distribution sectors across Syria and the wider region.

Our services are designed for hotels, restaurants, cafes, cinemas, schools, corporate institutions, and wholesale distributors.

sections.title: ✅ What We Offer for the Food Service Sector
sections.content:
🟢 Bulk packaging in customized weights and sizes (available upon request)

🟢 Wide range of flavors to suit every consumption environment — from classic to spicy

🟢 Private Label options for customized branding and packaging

🟢 High-quality products, locally manufactured with competitive pricing

🟢 Reliable logistics for both domestic and international markets

sections.title: 🎯 Who We Serve
sections.content:
Food supply and catering companies

Snack shops and mini-markets

Wholesale distributors

Hotels and resorts

Cafes and cinema concessions

Schools and summer camps

Export markets and trade partners

sections.title: 💼 Have Your Own Brand? We’ll Make It for You!
sections.content:
With our Private Label Manufacturing service, you can choose the product and flavor, and we’ll handle the rest — from production to packaging under your own brand.
We also offer custom design and labeling based on your target market requirements.

sections.title: 🚚 Smooth & Scalable Logistics
sections.content:
We support our partners with:

Local delivery across Syria

International shipping (FOB / CIF as required)

Complete export documentation: (Certificate of Origin , Lab Analysis Reports ,Commercial Invoices and Technical Sheets)

📩 Request a Quote Today
For corporate partnerships and foodservice distribution inquiries:
Production@villadifoodindustries.com

whoAreWe.title: Who are we
whoAreWe.description:
Syrian Flavor from the Heart

Viladi Food Industries is a leading Syrian company in the snack and food manufacturing sector. Established in 1987 in Aleppo under the name Al-Widad, the company evolved into Viladi, becoming a trusted brand known for excellence, quality, and innovation in the world of snacks.
For over three decades, Viladi has successfully blended authentic local identity with a modern vision, offering products that appeal to a wide range of tastes both in Syria and abroad.

history.title: Our Story
history.description:
Viladi began its journey in 1987 in the historic city of Aleppo. Driven by passion and a commitment to quality, the company witnessed steady growth year after year.
Today, our factory is located in Sheikh Najjar Industrial City – Aleppo, with an annual production capacity of around 2,000 tons, covering a wide variety of snacks, crunchy treats, and sweets.
This growth reflects our ongoing commitment to expanding production and strengthening our presence across local and regional markets.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description:
At Viladi, we aim to become a regional benchmark in crafting high-quality snacks with bold and innovative flavors.
We believe that building long-term relationships with our consumers starts with trust, and is earned through originality, flavor, and attention to detail.

quality.title: Quality You Can Taste
quality.description:
We use only premium ingredients — from natural corn kernels to healthy vegetable oils and certified flavorings.
Our manufacturing process follows strict quality control standards at every stage of production and packaging, supported by modern technologies that ensure cleanliness, safety, and consistency in every bite.

villadipuff.title: Viladi Puff
villadipuff.subtitle: Light, fun snacks with flavors like:

villadicorn.title: Viladi Corn
villadicorn.subtitle: Roasted corn with a bold crunch and creative seasonings:

tikapop.title: TikaPop
tikapop.subtitle: Ready-to-eat popcorn perfect for movie nights:

innovation.title: Flavor Innovation
innovation.description:
Our R&D team at Viladi is constantly creating new and exciting flavor experiences — from the classics like Cheddar and Ketchup to bold ideas like Noodles, Parmesan, or even Fruit flavors!
This wide variety reflects our philosophy: Every mood deserves its own crunch.

digital.title: Digital Presence & Community Engagement
digital.description:
We know how important it is to stay close to our audience, especially the younger generation.
That’s why we’re active on Instagram and Facebook — sharing new products, behind-the-scenes content, fun challenges, and youth-oriented campaigns like:

export.title: Export & Regional Reach
export.description: Viladi products are now enjoyed not only in Syria but also in countries like:
export.description2: We're always exploring new markets to bring the Syrian taste to every Arab home.

finish.title: In Conclusion
finish.descritption:
At Viladi Food Industries, we’re more than a snack company — we’re part of people’s daily flavor experience.
We grow with our audience, we listen to them, and we innovate for them.
Because you deserve the best, we’ll keep crunching and creating... from Aleppo to the world.
